name: The Disputed Territories of Ghotto
description:
"My hands are shaking with fear"

So begins the story of The Disputed Territories of Ghotto. 

3 levels of difficulty.

The game is a 1 button arcade game in the style of 'city bomber' and similar games for 8 bit consoles. Perfect to play on an emulator on your phone for example.

There are 9 bombing runs to complete, each one advances the story.

The game has a proper ending that I won't spoil here. I hope you enjoy.
